name: The Pessimist - chi-30039
description:
One of ten in The Pessimist series. Generated by a hand-coded python application, it is the first objkt series minted by @TheMaxBore. The Pessimist series is built on an instruction set that combines rectangles, ellipses, clipping paths, and fills to create geometric, conceptual, modern works that are structured in their composition, but organic in their rendition. All quantities, sizes, positions, and pallets are generated by the application. Chi-30039 is a nice example of a piece in which complexity finds balance from the distribution of form and color. The art exists as an svg to preserve the integrity of the original and allow viewing and reproduction at any size.

Generative art created by MaxBore
Official wallet: maxbore.tez
Official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/themaxbore
